IRCDaemon.name: Psylance Client Admin IRC Channel
IRCDaemon.post: About the attack on one of the staff members!
Yeah, rumour has it that an old Psylance member is behind it all.
@faithless, you mean that old caretaker who was fired last week?
No! Ugh, nevermind. Listen if I were you two, I'd tighten up your security, who knows what this guy'll do next.
Well I'd love to but I'm needed for the investigation into it all.
^ I assume you have a login, if you feel like helping grab yourself a copy of the report.
